alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:23AM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of four tenths to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Mississippi County. In Missouri, Dunklin and Pemiscot Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Expect power outages and tree damage due to the ice. Travel could be impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep extra blankets, food, water and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
